metadata.name: Suspicious Processes Spawned by WinRM
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious processes including shells spawnd from WinRM host process

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wsmprovhost.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\bash.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wsl.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certutil.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\whoami.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\bitsadmin.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious processes including shells spawnd from WinRM host process

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate WinRM usage Reference: Internal Research
